Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Exempts from taxation real property owned by a non-profit organization organized for the purpose of promoting future economic development
Summary: Creates a permissive class exemption from real property taxation on any real property owned by a non-profit organization organized for the purpose of promoting future economic development by means of the acquisition of real property for business, commercial or industrial development purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the exemption for non-profit organizations
